name: Simon and Mandrew save Christmas: a game about giving
name_original: Simon and Mandrew save Christmas: a game about giving
description:
Simon and Mandrew save Christmas: a game about giving 

how to play:

press the keys A, S, D, F to drop the correct coloured present into the chimney.

space and H drop Jaffacakes and dirt for the factory and sipsco however for some reason they didnt work in this build :(
